short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ExactNote is designed to create, view, and organize annotations on web pages and pdf documents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ExactNote is designed to create, view, and organize annotations on web pages and pdf documents. After text is highlighted, short notes can be added. Afterwards, these notes can be viewed by anyone on that web page who has access to the created annotation. Furthermore, these annotations can be organized and shared from the ExactNote website.
